url.description: External link (case study, live app, repo) or 'NA' if no link

skills.description: e.g. product design, design engineering, prototyping

Impact.description: The impact and outcomes of this project

images.description: Array of image URLs to display inline in the project

videos.description: Array of video URLs to display inline in the project

Tools Used.description: Array of tools used in this project (e.g. 'Figma', 'React', 'Xcode')

Tech Stack.description: Array of technologies/frameworks used in this project (e.g. 'React', 'TypeScript', 'SwiftUI')

role.description: Your role/title when working on this project (e.g. 'Product Designer', 'Software Engineering Intern'). Used for agent context only, not displayed in UI.

company.description: Company/organization where this project was completed (e.g. 'Meta', 'IDEO', 'Personal'). Used for agent context only, not displayed in UI.

evidence.description: Used for agent context only, not displayed in UI
